column4: i have a problem with the update manager: since 2 weeks ago it automatically pops up, as its supossed to do, but then, automatically turns to grey, its blocked, and I can only force quit it, any thoughts on this?
you can make updates over synaptic too
you can install updates over synaptic too
can you open synaptic
yes
choose source from status
i mean left side bottom
you want me to write "source" in the synaptic search bar? I clicked on "status"; it only reloaded a smaller list
no sry. choose left all and down select status
ok, i clicked on "status"
ok, select left installed (updateable)
ydo you want me to go to installed(upgradable)P=
yea right
hmm. have you empty the text in the search filter
no, what for?
the filter blocked all other items
we need all updates
have you clear the text in the search filer?
yes
good. have you now right a list with packages?
ok, the best is now if you select all packages and make then a richtclick
